section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this title, the term:

para.text: "Collision" shall have the same meaning as provided in section 2(3) of the District of Columbia Traffic Act, 1925, approved March 3, 1925 (43 Stat. 1119; D.C. Official Code § 50-2201.02(3)).
"DDOT" means the District Department of Transportation.
"Motor vehicle" shall have the same meaning as provided in section 2(11) of the District of Columbia Traffic Act, 1925, approved March 3, 1925 (43 Stat. 1119; D.C. Official Code § 50-2201.02(11)).
